tool.name: MAIQMag Resolution Inference
tool.description: A tool to predict high resolution spectra
tool.command: export TORCHINDUCTOR_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/torchinductor && pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /app python -m maiqmag_ml infer_resolution --ckpt $model --inp_file $input_data --out_file $result --out_file_plots res.png > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) mv res.png $plots
tool.help:
**MAIQMag Resolution Inference**
This is a Galaxy tool to predict high-resolution spectra using a vision transformer model.
